channel.title: CVE Feed for wpconcern -- Coming Soon & Maintenance Mode Page
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpconcern -- Coming Soon & Maintenance Mode Page

item.title: CVE-2020-36707|2024-08-04T17:37:06.503Z -- wpconcern -- coming%20soon%20%26%20maintenance%20mode%20page
item.description: The Coming Soon & Maintenance Mode Page plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.57. This is due to confusing logic functions missing or having incorrect nonce validation. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to gain and perform otherwise unauthorized access and actions via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2020-36752|2024-08-04T17:37:06.956Z -- wpconcern -- coming%20soon%20%26%20maintenance%20mode%20page
item.description: The Coming Soon & Maintenance Mode Page plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.57. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the save_meta_box() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to save meta boxes via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
